column4: I use Ubuntu, but I'd like to try KDE. I installed KDE desktop using synaptic. Now, how to select KDE as the effective desktop manager?
you can select it in gdm when you login you can choose kde instead of gnome and it'll ask you if u want to make it your default
you choose sessions in gdm to select which to use
so the KDE option will be automatically added in GDM menu?
